title: Wonderful hotel, superb views, and central location...
text: Wonderful hotel with beautiful views of the NYC skyline. The rooms are beautifully appointed and have a wonderful shower: it has a temperature gauge on the dial... a wonderful feature. I found that the staff at the front desk and at the restaurant were pleasant and made me feel welcome. The location is second to none because most of the tourist attractions and businesses are easily accessible. (Useful tip: Get the 7 day metro pass if you are staying in NYC for more than 4 days).
